00067 class NIFLoader : Ogre::ManualResourceLoader
00068 {
00069     public:
00070         static NIFLoader& getSingleton();
00071         static NIFLoader* getSingletonPtr();
00072 
00073         virtual void loadResource(Ogre::Resource *resource);
00074 
00075         static Ogre::MeshPtr load(const std::string &name,
00076                                   const std::string &group="General");
00077 
00078         Ogre::Vector3 convertVector3(const Nif::Vector& vec);
00079         Ogre::Quaternion convertRotation(const Nif::Matrix& rot);
00080 
00081     private:
00082         NIFLoader() : resourceGroup("General") {}
00083         NIFLoader(NIFLoader& n) {}
00084 
00085         void warn(std::string msg);
00086         void fail(std::string msg);
00087 
00088         void handleNode( Nif::Node *node, int flags,
00089                         const Nif::Transformation *trafo, BoundsFinder &bounds, Ogre::Bone *parentBone);
00090 
00091         void handleNiTriShape(Nif::NiTriShape *shape, int flags, BoundsFinder &bounds);
00092 
00093         void createOgreSubMesh(Nif::NiTriShape *shape, const Ogre::String &material, std::list<Ogre::VertexBoneAssignment> &vertexBoneAssignments);
00094 
00095         void createMaterial(const Ogre::String &name,
00096                             const Nif::Vector &ambient,
00097                             const Nif::Vector &diffuse,
00098                             const Nif::Vector &specular,
00099                             const Nif::Vector &emissive,
00100                             float glossiness, float alpha,
00101                             int alphaFlags, float alphaTest,
00102                             const Ogre::String &texName);
00103 
00104         void findRealTexture(Ogre::String &texName);
00105 
00106         Ogre::String getUniqueName(const Ogre::String &input);
00107 
00108         //returns the skeleton name of this mesh
00109         std::string getSkeletonName()
00110         {
00111             return resourceName + ".skel";
00112         }
00113         
00114         // This is the interface to the Ogre resource system. It allows us to
00115         // load NIFs from BSAs, in the file system and in any other place we
00116         // tell Ogre to look (eg. in zip or rar files.) It's also used to
00117         // check for the existence of texture files, so we can exchange the
00118         // extension from .tga to .dds if the texture is missing.
00119         Mangle::VFS::OgreVFS *vfs;
00120 
00121         std::string resourceName;
00122         std::string resourceGroup;
00123 
00124         // pointer to the ogre mesh which is currently build
00125         Ogre::Mesh *mesh;
00126         Ogre::SkeletonPtr skel;
00127 };
